alert.note: Alert for Lower Clark Fork Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 25 at 10:48AM MST until December 25 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total ice accumulations of a tenth of an inch up to one quarter of an inch. * WHERE...Evaro Hill, Highway 200 Thompson Falls to Plains, Highway 200 Trout Creek to Heron, and I-90 Lookout Pass to Haugan. * WHEN...Until 2 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be nearly impossible. Local power outages and tree damage are possible due to the ice.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
